# in / out of sample errors
```{r}
library(kernlab)
data(spam)
set.seed(333)

# let's look at frequency of capital letters
plot(density(spam$capitalAve[spam$type=="nonspam"]), 
     col="blue",main="",xlab="freq of your")
lines(density(spam$capitalAve[spam$type=="spam"]),col="red")

smallSpam=spam[sample(dim(spam)[1],size=10),]
spamLabel=(smallSpam$type=="spam")*1+1
plot(smallSpam$capitalAve,col=spamLabel)

# let's build a basic rule


```
